item.title: Is a Virtual Leased Line Right For Your Applications?
item.description: By: John Shepler Leased lines have been a popular choice for businesses since they were introduced by telephone companies decades ago. This article explores the concept of virtual leased lines and their potential benefits for businesses. Before delving into virtual leased lines, let’s review traditional leased lines and their functionality. Leased Lines vs Shared Bandwidth A leased line is a dedicated telecommunications line rented for a specific duration, usually 1 to 3 years.
